name: Transparent Black
description: When the school is over, by sunset glow covered. Eight girls still hover, the ones without a lover. How come a girl suffers, in such a Ivory Tower? With feathers shorn and shaven, raucously quoth the raven.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP/Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel/AMD/VIA 1Ghz+ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA/AMD/Intel GT200+/R7+/HD Storage: 32 MB available space
